message: Let's start fair! I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. We can discuss it further if you reject.
My turn!  How about a more even split this time? 60/40 seems fair.
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to go down to 5500, but I won't go any lower.  It's still more for me than your 4000 offer, but it's closer to a fair split.
Okay, let's make this simple. A straight 50/50 split.  Can't get fairer than that!
